name: Sporty Bike
description: The Sporty Bike combines speed and style, perfect for urban commuting and weekend adventures.

name: Mountain Explorer
description: Designed for rough terrain, the Mountain Explorer offers a sturdy frame and reliable performance.

name: Road Racer
description: The Road Racer is built for speed, featuring lightweight materials and aerodynamic design for optimal performance.

name: Urban Cruiser
description: The Urban Cruiser offers a comfortable ride with its ergonomic design, ideal for city commuting.

name: Kids Bike
description: This Kids Bike is perfect for little adventurers, featuring a lightweight frame and fun colors.

name: Electric Scooter
description: The Electric Scooter is an eco-friendly transportation option that offers convenience and efficiency.

name: Hybrid Bike
description: The Hybrid Bike merges the best features of road and mountain bikes for versatile riding.

name: Commuter Bike
description: The Commuter Bike is designed for easy navigation through city streets, with a focus on comfort.

name: Foldable Bike
description: This Foldable Bike is compact and easy to carry, making it perfect for those with limited storage space.

name: Adventure Bike
description: The Adventure Bike is designed for long rides, featuring a comfortable seat and robust frame.
